page.title: 07ECONOMICS
page.content: Compared to other parts of the country Havant is a very prosperous area.There are lots of large factories,two of these are Marconis and Plesseys. .Marconis makes missiles like Sea_Dart,Skyflash,Seawolf,Sea Skua, ,Rapier and the new P3T-Anti Ships Missile.Sea Skua is carried by a helicopter,the helicopter drops the missile which is then homed into the target by a radar in the Lynx.Seawolf is an anti- missile- missile that means that it destroys other missiles. .Plesseys make radios for the armed forces like battlefield radios.IBM make computers, some of its major branches are in the Havant .IBM has little firms working for it which do things like packaging.Other small firms make electronic components.
